topic: Impact of dynamic thinking strategies on innovation in the solar sector
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that regularly shuffling prompts or creating new ones can significantly enhance creative problem-solving by fostering dynamic thinking. The next step is to implement a routine where I either shuffle existing prompts or generate new, challenging ones weekly. This practice will help uncover fresh insights and potentially lead to innovative ideas across various fields.

metadata.trigger: If I shuffled my own prompts, what new ones emerge?
